overview: A seemingly innocent voicemail message left on a man’s answer machine by his ex, soon turns on its head when we learn of his dark past in their relationship. We quickly learn that our protagonist may not be as innocent as he seems, through the heart-wrenching monologue delivered to him via the tiny machine in his home.
tagline: A seemingly innocent voicemail message left on a man’s answer machine by his ex, soon unravels into something more.
title: Answer
